title: bc群组 在config文件加入了两个子服就崩溃
author: HSA12138
txt_content:
bc群组 在config文件加入了两个子服就崩溃
ip_forward: false
custom_server_name: HexaCord
log_commands: false
listeners:
- query_port: 25577
  motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: false
  proxy_protocol: false
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
  ping_passthrough: false
  priorities:
  - lobby
  bind_local_address: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25577
  max_players: 1
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: false
always_handle_packets: false
online_mode: true
connection_throttle: 4000
groups:
  md_5:
  - admin
player_limit: -1
prevent_proxy_connections: false
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
stats: 9a24cf1e-057b-45f2-bded-619b36bac2e9
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
timeout: 30000
servers:
  lobby:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25565
    restricted: false
  DNF:
    motd: '&c&l次元危机'
    address: 127.0.0.1:25568
    restricted: false
  理想乡:
    motd: '&c&l理想乡'
    address: 127.0.0.1:25555
    restricted: false
network_compression_threshold: 256

replies.author: 你飘了吗？
replies.txt_content: 这个bc端 confim不能使用中文 ，你改成英文就可以了

replies.author: HSA12138
replies.txt_content:
你飘了吗？ 发表于 2018-6-2 13:26
这个bc端 confim不能使用中文 ，你改成英文就可以了
怎么设置玩家进入时所在的服务器  现在玩家在哪里下就在哪里上线
